attributes.action: make school uniform comfortable and casual
attributes.background: Make school uniform more comfortable and casual as it is very old-fashioned that children have to look smart therefore wealthy to be educated. I think that parliament should aim to create a more comfortable and casual looking uniform for all students in the UK.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the design of school uniforms are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you think schools shouldn't be able to require students to wear a school uniform, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban uniform in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871
